magnate.ui.text

Class Text

  • java.lang.Object
    • magnate.ui.text.Text

  • public class Text
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the game in textmode. This class doesn't have support to games with AI.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Filipe

        Shows the tokens of the given player.
        Parameters:
        single_line - show tokens on a single line.
        show_numbers - show the numbers related to each token.
        p - the player.
        Returns:
        the number of tokens.

        Shows the hand of the current player.
        Parameters:
        calculate_tokens - shows if it is possible to play that card.
        deed - if the card to be played is a deed.
        Returns:
        number of cards in hand.
